\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{?} & {?} & {?} & 0 & {?} \\
	\bullet & \bullet & \bullet & \bullet \\
	\bullet & \bullet & \bullet & \bullet \\
	0 & {!} & 0
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow[dotted, no head, from=1-4, to=4-2]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=4-1, to=4-2]
	\arrow[from=4-2, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
